biotools.summary: TimeCycle is designed to detect rhythmic genes in circadian transcriptomic time-series data. Based on topological data analysis, TimeCycle provides a reliable and efficent reference-free framework for cycle detection — handling custom sampling schemes, replicates, and missing data.

bioschemas.name: TimeCycle
